plot: A popular wise man/folk healer is anxious to marry off his daughter, but she refuses all his suggested suitors.
title: Haham Gamliel
plot_es: A popular wise man/folk healer is anxious to marry off his daughter, but she refuses all his suggested suitors.
plot_en: A popular wise man/folk healer is anxious to marry off his daughter, but she refuses all his suggested suitors.
